page.title: 04Farming in the Area.
page.content: We found that in going through the area to do the Domesday Survey that most of the farms were involved in the production of milk. One farm ran the local milk round, surving a large proportion of Penistone and district. This farm provides{green top milk } which is untreated in any way. There have been some doubts about the safety of this milk so pasturising equipment has been bought. Many people still believe that untreated milk is the best. As a result of the new milk quotas introduced throughout the Common Market some farmers in the area have pulled out of dairy farming and turned their land over to sheep or to arable crops.
